Basically, Grappelli gives you a new look & feel for the Django Admin-Interface.

=Features=
  * *New/Improved Look & Feel*
  * *Enhanced Collapsibles*
  * *Reordering (Drag & Drop) for Edit-inlines (Stacked & Tabular)*
  * *Visual Generic Relationships*
  * *!PositionField*
  * *Grappelli TinyMCE Skin*
  * Additional Navigation Area on the Index-Site
  * User-related Bookmarks in the Header-Section
